title: Jeff Kendall Weed Takes the Ibis Exie on a Road Trip with His Moto
content: Jeff Kendall Weed strapped his Ibis Exie onto his motorcycle and headed into the mountains on a road trip. Check out this video for a good mix of camping and rippinâ€™ the new, sub-2000 gram US-made Exie.
author: prolly
